cgid.array.get_analytic_frames(session, area, trial, epoch=None, fa=10, fb=45)[source]¶

Scripts to pack data into frames are in the visualze file. I’ve moved them to cgidtools. packArrayDataInterpolate(session,area,data) accept NChannel x Ntimes and returns frame-packed data w. interp’d electrodes elaborate on this,
